isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 18 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RTLO-14618 AND RTLO-16618 SERIES - INSTALL - AIR LINES AND AIR FILTER/REGULATOR

note.para: Recommended sealant for fittings is Fuller Sealant part number 71205.

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve (inset, Figure 299) and the HI Range Port of the range cylinder. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 299. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and HI Range Port

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve (inset, Figure 300) and the LO Range Port of the range cylinder. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 300. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and LO Range Port

step1.para: Position the air filter/regulator on the auxiliary housing. Apply Loctite 242 or equivalent to the bolt threads and install the two retaining bolts ( Figure 301). Tighten to 8 to 12 ft-lbs. (11 to 16 N·m).

figure.caption: Figure 301. Position Air Filter/Regulator on Auxiliary Housing

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the slave valve (inset, Figure 302) and the air filter/regulator. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 302. Connect Air Hose Between Slave Valve and Air Filter/Regulator

step1.para: Connect the 1/4 inch I.D. air hose between the air filter/regulator (inset, Figure 303) and the splitter cylinder cover. Tighten fittings securely.

figure.caption: Figure 303. Connect Air Hose Between Air Filter/Regulator and Splitter Cylinder Cover
